title: FLEX TEAM LF A MID LANER
body:
My name is Dean and i'm looking for new members to join a club I just made.
Requirements:
17+
Discord.
Microphone with no background noise / keyboard clicks (any mic can be optimized to stop this, look in to it)
No flamers.

Add me on League:
Bubbielift

Fill this out if you're looking for a team and send it to me via league <3

Name:
Age:
Where your from:
Were you banned in season 7 / Pre-Season?
If yes, why?
Reason you're looking for a team:
Prefered Roles:

replies.body:
Name: Prometheus 
Age: 12
Yes I was banned for toxicity, scripting, and boosting.
Iâ€™m looking for a team to play Anivia and Trundle so I can stop your recalls.
MID LANE also can double jungle
